Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the state of the game at any point in time (enemy/player locations, state of cells...)
    Version:
    1.0 Created the rough outline of the class (attributes and methods but with little implementation) - Stefan
    1.1 implemented the constructor which creates a player and loads the cells into the grid - Alan 1.2 created hash map to map cell type to its abbreviation for file output - Stefan
    Author:
    Stefan, Alan, Millie
